positive: High-quality product photography. Show main object in three-quarters view, fully visible with all parts in sharp focus. Deblur any blurry regions. Preserve original art style, colors, textures, and material properties exactly. For glass, crystal, or transparent materials: maintain realistic transparency, refraction, and light transmission. Solid neutral background with good contrast against object. Remove background clutter and watermarks. Keep related accessories attached to main object. Clean crisp edges.
negative: NSFW, (worst quality:2), (low quality:2), (normal quality:2), style change, color shift, texture alteration, material change, (opaque glass:1.5), (solid transparent objects:1.5), lost transparency, lost refraction, multiple unrelated objects, complex background, environmental scene, dramatic lighting, harsh shadows, artistic reinterpretation, painterly, sketchy, conceptual art, abstract, cropped object, partial view, occluded features, (blurry:1.5), (out of focus:1.5), motion blur, depth of field, bokeh, (monochrome), (grayscale), (low contrast), (underexposed), (overexposed), (amateur), (bad proportions:1.331), (unclear edges:1.5), (soft edges:1.3), separated components, disassembled parts, floating elements
